root: ^ISABELLE: Good evening, this is Riley’s bedtime story service. Can I speak to Riley, please?
^ISABELLE: Okay, okay. How are you doing, sweetheart?
^ISABELLE: I miss you, too. Just a few more months, and I’ll be home, okay?
^RILEY: Okay. What story are you going to tell me tonight?
^ISABELLE: Did I ever tell you about the time I met the stars?
^ISABELLE: One night, when I was out collecting a fallen weather balloon…
